what_to_watch_out_for_validated.issue: WOF-001: Profile Form Save & Input Validation Failures
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.limitation: The Employee Profile form lacks robust input validation and data persistence mechanisms.
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.evidence: Edit form for Personal section opened correctly with pre-filled data. Cancel and Save buttons functioned. Form fields had proper types (textbox, combobox, date picker).

what_to_watch_out_for_validated.issue: WOF-004: Employee Profile Deletion & Data Recovery Limitations
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.limitation: Deleted profiles without associated user IDs cannot be recovered.
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.evidence: The employee list shows permanent deletion capability through checkbox selection. Offboard button on Work tab exists but deletion is irreversible per the limitation description. No restore/undo mechanism visible in the UI.

what_to_watch_out_for_validated.issue: WOF-005: Profile Data Visibility & Reporting Constraints
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.limitation: Reporting and visibility features lack comprehensive data access.
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.evidence: The employee list displays limited columns (Name, Employee ID, Hired At, Job Title, Department, Profile Completion). While Columns button allows customization, and Download button provides export, the AI Reports banner suggests analytics are still being promoted rather than fully integrated.

what_to_watch_out_for_validated.limitation: Inconsistent navigation patterns and missing functionality.
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.evidence: Navigation between employee list and profile was consistent. All 12 tabs loaded correctly. Edit/Cancel/Save pattern was consistent across Personal, Contact, and Additional Data sections. Breadcrumb navigation worked properly.

what_to_watch_out_for_validated.limitation: Lacks automated email reminder functionality for incomplete profiles.
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.evidence: Profile completion percentages visible on employee list (ranging from 17% to 98%). 'Missing information' widget on dashboard shows '50 Employees missing information' with a 'Find out who' link, but no automated email reminder capability was found in the UI.

what_to_watch_out_for_validated.limitation: The Employee Profile location fields have incomplete geographic data.
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.evidence: Work tab showed Work Location (Dubai), Legal Country of Residence (United Arab Emirates), Residency Visa Issue Location (Dubai), Office (Bayzat DIFC). Location fields appeared populated for the tested employee.

what_to_watch_out_for_validated.limitation: The Employee Profile lacks consistent integration with leave management.
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.evidence: Leaves tab showed multiple leave policies with available balances. Leave requests visible with statuses. Work tab showed leave management checkboxes and link to approval flow. Integration appeared functional.
Testing was conducted in English only. Arabic language toggle visible in header but not tested.

what_to_watch_out_for_validated.issue: WOF-008: Authorization & API Permission Scope Issues
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.limitation: Unnecessary API call to time-off configuration endpoint.
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.evidence: API-level validation not possible through UI testing.

what_to_watch_out_for_validated.limitation: Lacks comprehensive backend mechanisms for handling nationality changes.
what_to_watch_out_for_validated.evidence: Personal section edit form shows Nationality as a combobox dropdown (currently set to India). The field is editable from the admin view. Backend handling of nationality changes cannot be verified via UI testing.

summary: Employee Profile validation completed successfully. The feature provides a comprehensive employee management system accessed via Company > Employees > All employees. Key findings: 12-tab employee profile (About Me, Work, Documents, Dependents, Leaves, Health Insurance, Payroll, Attendance, Timesheet, Assets, Air tickets, Performance), full CRUD operations (Add Employee with bulk import, profile viewing, inline editing, offboarding/deletion), 3 list views (grid, list, org chart), workflow integration with employee triggers, and 40+ approval flow types. Profile completion tracking, search/filter functionality, and configurable column display are all functional. Of 10 WOF issues: 2 confirmed (deletion recovery, profile completion automation), 4 not reproducible, 2 skipped (localization, API-level), and 2 confirmed with workarounds.
